subscribe.subscribe_description: Add this calendar to your favorite calendar app to stay up to date with all events.
subscribe.verify_help: Check if the calendar feed is accessible.
subscribe.how_to_add: How to add to your calendar
subscribe.instruction_google: Click 'Add to Google Calendar' and follow the instructions.
subscribe.instruction_outlook: Click 'Add to Outlook' and follow the instructions.
subscribe.instruction_apple: Copy the Webcal URL and add it to your Apple Calendar.
subscribe.troubleshoot_verify: Click the verify button to check if the feed is accessible. If it works, try adding the link to your calendar app again.
subscribe.troubleshoot_click: If clicking the button does not work, try copying the URL manually.
subscribe.troubleshoot_contact: Contact spindelman@fsektionen.se if you continue to have issues or if any of the quick links do not work.
